title: New Jungle item tooltip
body:
A tooltip was placed on hunter's machete/talisman on the pbe that says 'limited to 1 jungle/gold generation item.' Does this mean that if you have one you are unable to purchase the other and have to upgrade?
Edit: to clarify, if i have machete, will i be able to purchase talisman. Thank you all.

replies.body:
BRB...
Yes, it does mean that.  You cannot purchase Machete if you have Talisman.
That blows, no more spellthiefs,relic shield sup jgler qq ;c

> [{quoted}](name=Sona Ping,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=J6OEvNgy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-12T05:47:48.110+0000)
>
> BRB...
> Yes, it does mean that.  You cannot purchase Machete if you have Talisman.

well that's lame. Thank you for checking.

I'm assuming this is because of the sightstone passive quest that was added to support items. This is probably for clarity reasons so you can't accidentally get the sightstone jungle item, then sightstone from your support item (they don't stack).

> [{quoted}](name=TiltoverEnforcer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=J6OEvNgy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-12T05:52:02.895+0000)
>
> I'm assuming this is because of the sightstone passive quest that was added to support items. This is probably for clarity reasons so you can't accidentally get the sightstone jungle item, then sightstone from your support item (they don't stack).

I could have sworn that you were able to get {{item:3711}} and{{item:2049}} currently.

> [{quoted}](name=Pendergast891,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=J6OEvNgy,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-01-12T05:56:52.249+0000)
>
> I could have sworn that you were able to get {{item:3711}} and{{item:2049}} currently.

Oh, I'm sure you can, just like how you can buy 6 {{item:2049}} . However, due to their warding unique passives having the same name, they don't stack.

I'm thinking this change on the PBE was for clarity's sake.
